title: IT WAS ONLY NUKES! Burger King The Creepiest Of All? 08.15.22
itunes:title: IT WAS ONLY NUKES! Burger King The Creepiest Of All? 08.15.22
description:
In episode 1309, Miles and guest co-host DJ Danl Goodman are joined by co-authors of How to Be Fine: What We Learned from Living by the Rules of 50 Self-Help Books and the hosts of Romance Road Test, Kristen Meinzer and Jolenta Greenburg to discuss... Ohhhh so they planted nuclear secrets…, Burger King Has A Long History Of Creeping People Out and more!

  1. Burger King Has A Long History Of Creeping People Out
  2. Burger King Just Sent a Blank Email to Everyone
  3. Tim Hortons app tracked movement in violation privacy laws -Canadian regulator
  4. Tim Hortons Offers a Free Coffee and Pastry for Spying on People for Over a Year
  5. Here’s Why Burger King Just Mysteriously Sent Thousands of Customers Blank Email Receipts
  6. Burger King Ad that Uses Voice Control Backfires, Then Goes Viral
  7. Delete 10 Facebook friends, get a free Whopper
  8. The Untold Truth Of Burger King

Check Out: By The Book Pod

LISTEN: Confession by Budgie

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
